mapper.insert: insert into course (name, coach_id, time_slot_id, capacity, room_number, start_date, end_date, description) VALUES (#{name},#{coach_id},#{time_slot_id},#{capacity},#{room_number},#{start_date},#{end_date},#{description})
mapper.update: update course set number_of_member = number_of_member + 1 where id=#{id};
update course set number_of_member = number_of_member - 1 where id=#{id};
